instructions.name: close_empty_token_account
docs: Closes a token account if it has a zero balance

accounts.name: token_account
docs: The token account to close (supports both spl_token and spl_token_2022)

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority of the token account. Must sign.

accounts.name: destination
docs: The account to receive the rent from closing the token account.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: The token program (either spl_token or spl_token_2022)

instructions.name: close_order
docs: Closes an order, returning tokens from the order vault

accounts.name: return_input_token_account
docs: Account to which leftover tokens in the order vault should be returned.

accounts.name: return_rent_to
docs: Account to which rent for the order account and vault should be returned.

accounts.name: closer
docs: Account that is authorized to close the order

instructions.name: create_referral_token_account_idempotent
docs: Create a referral token account if it doesn't already exist

accounts.name: referral_token_account
docs: The referral token account to create. This is a PDA of the Referral program whose seeds are
[b"referral_ata", referral_account, mint].

instructions.name: fill_order
docs: Fills an order, closing the order after filling it

accounts.name: output_token_account
docs: Account to which output from the fill should be sent.

accounts.name: return_input_token_account
docs: Account to which leftover tokens in the order vault should be returned.

accounts.name: return_rent_to
docs: Account to which rent for the order account and vault should be returned.

accounts.name: input_mint
docs: Input mint for the swap. Must be specified if the order inputs a mint for which the filler's
associated token account doesn't exist.

accounts.name: output_mint
docs: Output mint for the swap. Must be specified if the order outputs native SOL or a mint for
which the filler's associated token account doesn't exist.

instructions.name: init_market_ledger_idempotent
docs: Initialize a market ledger if it doesn't already exist

instructions.name: open_order
docs: Opens an order, escrowing the input tokens in the order vault

accounts.name: order
docs: Order account that the instruction will create to store the order details

accounts.name: order_vault
docs: Token account that the instruction will create to escrow the input tokens for the order

accounts.name: input_token_account
docs: Token account from which input tokens should be withdrawn to fund the order

accounts.name: output_token_account
docs: Account to which output from the fill should be sent. If the order specifies that it should
output native SOL, then this should be the user's wallet, although any account is allowed.
If the order doesn't specify that it should output native SOL, then this must be an SPL
token account, and the token account's mint determines the order's output mint.

accounts.name: return_input_token_account
docs: Account to which leftover tokens in the order vault should be returned when the order is
filled or closed. If the input is native SOL, this should be the user's wallet, although any
account is allowed. If the input is wrapped SOL or an SPL token, this must be an SPL token
account for the input mint.

accounts.name: user_token_authority
docs: Authority of the input token account

accounts.name: fee_payer
docs: Account that pays the fee budget for the order

accounts.name: fee_receiver
docs: Account that receives the fee budget funds

accounts.name: rent_depositor
docs: Depositor for the order account and vault account rent

instructions.name: swap
docs: Executes a token swap

instructions.name: swap2
docs: Executes a token swap with a slippage fee

instructions.name: swap2_with_destination
docs: Executes a token swap with a slippage fee. Outputs to the specified destination account.

instructions.name: swap2_with_destination_native
docs: Executes a token swap with a slippage fee. Outputs native SOL to the specified destination
account by unwrapping WSOL.

accounts.name: destination_account
docs: The destination account that will receive the native SOL

instructions.name: swap_with_destination
docs: Executes a token swap. Outputs to the specified destination account.

instructions.name: swap_with_destination_native
docs: Executes a token swap. Outputs native SOL to the specified destination account by unwrapping
WSOL.

accounts.name: destination_account
docs: The destination account that will receive the native SOL

instructions.name: transfer_fee
docs: Transfer an SPL token fee if the receiving account can receive it

instructions.name: transfer_sol
docs: Transfer native SOL from one account to another

instructions.name: transfer_to_sponsor
docs: Transfer an SPL token to a sponsor's token account, creating the sponsor's token account if
necessary.

instructions.name: unwrap_sol
docs: Unwrap all SOL in the provided wrapped SOL token account

instructions.name: wrap_sol
docs: Wrap SOL, creating a wrapped SOL associated token account if necessary

errors.name: SwapCpiFailed
errors.msg: Swap CPI failed

errors.name: SlippageLimitExceeded
errors.msg: Slippage limit exceeded

errors.name: FeeAccountNotSpecified
errors.msg: Fee account must be specified when platform_fee_bps is nonzero

errors.name: InvalidFeeAccountOwner
errors.msg: Invalid fee account owner

errors.name: InputAmountIsZero
errors.msg: input_amount must be greater than 0

errors.name: OutputTokenAccountMismatch
errors.msg: Swap output token account did not match the order's output_token_account

errors.name: OrderNotFillableAfterLastFillableSlot
errors.msg: Order's last_fillable_slot has passed

errors.name: FillOrderNotAuthorized
errors.msg: filler is not authorized to fill the order

errors.name: MintAccountNotSpecified
errors.msg: Instruction must specify mint account

errors.name: ReturnInputTokenAccountMismatch
errors.msg: return_input_token_account did not match the order's return_input_token_account

errors.name: ReturnRentToMismatch
errors.msg: return_rent_to did not match the order's return_rent_to

errors.name: CloseOrderNotAuthorized
errors.msg: closer is not authorized to close the order

errors.name: InvalidReturnInputTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid return_input_token_account

errors.name: InvalidOutputTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid output_token_account

errors.name: CouldNotReturnInput
errors.msg: Couldn't return input from vault

errors.name: LegInputOverconsumption
errors.msg: Leg consumed more than allowed input amount

errors.name: RouteInputUnderconsumption
errors.msg: Route consumed less than minimum allowed amount of input

errors.name: LegConsumedOutput
errors.msg: Leg consumed output

errors.name: LegConsumedLamports
errors.msg: Leg consumed lamports

errors.name: PumpFunAmmCreatedFeeAta
errors.msg: Pump.fun AMM leg created the protocol fee ATA

errors.name: SkippedLeg
errors.msg: A leg in the route was skipped

errors.name: DestinationTokenAccountDoesNotExist
errors.msg: Destination token account does not exist

errors.name: Token2022ProgramNotProvided
errors.msg: Token 2022 Program account not provided

errors.name: InvalidLegInputTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid leg input token account

errors.name: RaydiumLaunchlabCreatedFeeAta
errors.msg: Raydium Launchlab leg created fee ATA

errors.name: LegUnderproducedOutput
errors.msg: Leg produced less output than expected

errors.name: NoSettlementTokensReceived
errors.msg: No settlement tokens were received during the swap

errors.name: InsufficientAccountsForOpenPredictionsOrder
errors.msg: Insufficient accounts provided for OpenPredictionsOrder action

errors.name: InvalidTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid token account. Must be either spl_token or spl_token_2022 account

docs: Optional flags for the swap

fields.name: quoted_out_amount
docs: Quoted output amount after platform fee

fields.name: fee_budget
docs: Maximum amount in lamports that the fee payer will pay to have the order filled or closed

fields.name: fillable_for_slots
docs: Number of slots after the slot in which the order is opened for which the order is fillable.
If zero, the order is only fillable in the slot in which the open transaction landed.

fields.name: slippage_bps
docs: Max allowed slippage in basis points. Along with `quoted_out_amount`, this is used to
calculate the minimum allowed output amount.

fields.name: closer
docs: Account that is authorized to close the order

fields.name: flags
docs: Flags for the order

fields.name: quoted_out_amount
docs: Quoted output amount for the predictions order

fields.name: slippage_bps
docs: Slippage for the predictions order (separate from swap slippage)

fields.name: closer
docs: Account that is authorized to close the order

fields.name: output_token_account
docs: Account to which output from the fill should be sent. If the order specifies that it should
output native SOL, then this should be the user's wallet, although any account is allowed.
If the order doesn't specify that it should output native SOL, then this must be an SPL
token account, and the token account's mint determines the order's output mint.

fields.name: return_input_token_account
docs: Account to which leftover tokens in the order vault should be returned when the order is
filled or closed. If the input is native SOL, this should be the user's wallet, although any
account is allowed. If the input is wrapped SOL or an SPL token, this must be an SPL token
account for the input mint.

fields.name: return_rent_to
docs: Account to which rent for the account should be returned when the account is closed

fields.name: id
docs: ID used to produce a unique PDA for the order account

fields.name: last_fillable_slot
docs: Highest slot at which the order can be filled

fields.name: slippage_bps
docs: Max allowed slippage in basis points. Along with `quoted_out_amount`, this is used to
calculate the minimum allowed output amount for the order.

fields.name: vault_bump
docs: Bump seed for the vault token account associated with the order

fields.name: flags
docs: Flags for the order

fields.name: orchestrator_flags
docs: Optional flags for the swap

fields.name: orchestrator_flags
docs: Optional flags for the swap

fields.name: quoted_out_amount
docs: Quoted output amount for the swap after platform fee

fields.name: slippage_bps
docs: Max allowed slippage in basis points. Along with `quoted_out_amount`, this is used to
calculate the minimum allowed output amount for the swap.

fields.name: platform_fee_bps
docs: Platform fee in basis points. If nonzero, this percentage of the output amount will be
transferred to the platform fee account, and the instruction must include the platform fee
account as the last account. The platform fee account must be a valid token account for the
output mint, and it must specify the public key of the Referral program's DFlow project as
its owner.

fields.name: positive_slippage_fee_limit_pct
docs: Limit on the positive slippage fee in percent. The positive slippage fee is limited to the
lesser of (1) the excess actual out amount above the quoted amount and (2) this percentage
of the actual out amount after platform fee.

fields.name: quoted_out_amount
docs: Quoted output amount for the swap after platform fee

fields.name: slippage_bps
docs: Max allowed slippage in basis points. Along with `quoted_out_amount`, this is used to
calculate the minimum allowed output amount for the swap.

fields.name: platform_fee_bps
docs: Platform fee in basis points. If nonzero, this percentage of the output amount will be
transferred to the platform fee account, and the instruction must include the platform fee
account as the last account. The platform fee account must be a valid token account for the
output mint, and it must specify the public key of the Referral program's DFlow project as
its owner.

docs: Optional flags for the swap
